item_category: The return of a classic - With easy-to-use buttons, smooth curves, and a comfortable grip, Nokia 5310 is a new take on an old favourite - an iconic design with fresh face. Mix it up, anytime, anywhere, thanks to the MP3 player and wireless FM radio with dedicated music buttons and powerful dual front-facing speakers. See what's playing at a glance with the clear, curved display.

Good phone with a few adjustments
Excellent for those who can only use a keypad
I love this phone because of design battery life
good upgrade for my previous nokia 103.
very good 2g phone with basic internet access
Good phone for money only issue volume controls
A touch of nostalgia great for those who just need

my phone is easy to set up and use
My phone is good to listen to music.
A great little phone, just the same as my old one
ist class 'phone and simple to use.
My New Phone does all I want it to
nice easy phone for a pensioner

This phone ticks all my boxes

Very good buy. Very easy to use and fast delvery
Phone is great easy to use,
Nokia 5310 - Cheap and does the job!
Phone is great two SIM cards slots and a radio
A more updated 'dumb' phone. Meets my needs.
Simple and a good backup phone
review_text: I was very happy with product
I always use a basic phone in kitchen, because I have dropped so many phones while working(not in the food) .. it's a great phone for me small and light weight, and do the job well. Thanks!
nice button phone for a elderly person,  bought it for my father in law,

Who could design a phone which allows the ringtone volume to decrease to zero whilst in your pocket, even when the keypad is locked? And who could be irresponsible enough to pass it as fit for sale? Nokia used to be well respected - what went wrong? I bitterly regret choosing this model. Not fit for purpose.

I bought it mostly for the basic features, I use it as an alarm, radio and media player. I tested it with a sim and is good overall but the internet does not do too much. There is Facebook installed, but unfortunately you cannot add Messenger. I find it better to use it for these features than have just a media player. It can also be a good back up phone for emergencies.
I purchased it a month ago
Great value and easy to use. Reliable and simple. What more could you ask?

Bought this for my 85 year old mother
Great features and easy to use, even for an older lady

Fair enough feature phone. Features include mp3 player, radio, vga (0.3mp) camera to take pic's and record video. There is "internet access" which is reminiscent to the Nokia mobile's of the earl/mid 2000's, so don't expect smartphone internet connections. All round if you want a simple feature phone to text, send pictures & make calls then this is a good phone.
Purchased this phone on the same day I visited store and got a great service from the colleagues in Argos Bath Road Slough

I bought this as an emergency phone when when was in for repair. Advertised as unlocked, I would assume it would be fairly universal, however if was not compatible with my network. 
Standard issue SIM cards are generally 3G, this phone only takes a 2G SIM so it was useless to me.

Bought for an older person who does not do smart phones. The buttons are easy to press and the display is a good size. This is a replacement for another, older but similar style nokia and the only annoying part is the sim card size. It's gone back to the larger sim size meaning I also had to purchase another sim card just for the outer carriage to make the sim fit. This would have been useful to know at the time of purchase.
Not happy that I bought this. Ringer volume is easily turned down unintentional whilst keypad is locked.  Otherwise it would have been perfect for my requirement...

I bought this phone a couple of weeks ago and its a decent little phone for the price. Battery life is good its lasted me nearly a week when fully charged. Would recommend  as a good back up phone for anyone looking for one while there's is getting fixed or waiting for an upgrade.
Bought for someone in their 70’s who didn’t need anything to complicated. Great for anyone wanting a simple phone to make and receive calls
Bought for someone computer illiterate. No thrills phone. Easy to text and call.
I bought this a few weeks ago and it's the best phone for me to use. All the buttons are big enough for me to see and even better it fits in

Bought it for emergency use as it has a long standby battery - seems to be >6 days. Kept in car and on a different network to my Android phone. Android phone battery doesn't last above 1-1.5days  Not found any problems. Camera not high resolution but didn't buy it for that.. Took a bit of time getting used to telephone type keyboard again!
I wanted an inexpensive camera that would do the normal things well. This what this camera does, and does well.
I bought this a month ago and am happy with this product
Does the job for my elderly mother has a decent FM radio too!

Quick and easy phone to use. 
 
I am very very happy with this purchase.

The side volume buttons still work while phone is locked so was forever missing calls because the volume had been turned down. I pulled the side switches away slightly and cut the button off “) job done
Excellent for those who can only use a keypad, not many of these around now
I love this mobile because of design and the size looks beautiful ❤️❤️
A more concise instruction leaflet in the packaging would have been helpful.
Easy to fit the sim card, cover clips on well, clear display & functions are logical.
Great little phone, not too complicated, menu straightforward.
You don't have to worry about battery running out, does simple things very well

Good phone for money. Had last Nokia for 10 years HOWEVER...volume buttons on side of phone means often when you pick up phone the volume turns down to the point where you don’t here phone ringing. Very limited instructions even on line.
Great for those who need a basic and reliable phone

i bought this as a spare phone to have some detox time away from my smartphone.  i needed a phone with basic functions but not enough to keep me distracted from my walks and trips.  happy with this purchase.
Received my phone promptly it all that I required easy to use. Very easy to use.
easy to set up and even my wife can use it.
Wanted a simple phone for work calls only. This is what I got, easy to set up and simple to use, great value for money.
I bought this phone for my uncle & he's delighted with it. Similar to the one he had. Easy to use & great value too.
before getting this phone i was using a old peaples phone (according to my family) so i decided to give this one a go and i love it its easy to use and looks good., and the battery lasts for ever.
This is a fair enough feature phone, does all of the basics i.e makes & receives calls, sends & receives text's & mms'. All round a good little phone.
The phone which is basic is for my wife but suits her needs exactly, and the Argos shop in Sainsburry is in a great location with excellent parking
Great phone for me nana
Is a dual sim phone, I use it for calls mainly, you can use headphones, listen music or radio stations even play games. The battery lasts long. I’m happy I bought this phone.
Excellent service good price

Bought this little guy  due to my iPhone 11 Pro Max's decided to play up. I'm just using this phone temporarily.

Easy to use, dual sim is a huge thumbs up for me and that's it for me really.
Bought for my mum, she absolutely loves it. Nice and simple to use.
Only need a basic phone to send and receive calls and texts as don’t use the internet and this is exactly what is required.
It has a white color and it's compatible with memory card and Micro sd card. It looks good. It also has 1 earphone port. It's Bluetooth.

Brilliantly simple, does just what it says on the tin "makes calls & texts" 
Brilliant.
Good phone, bought it because I quit the land line, battery life is very good, and perfect if you want to use it only for calls, good sound.

It was the price that made me buy it.
With the data it has, you would expect to pay a lot more.
I'm very happy with the mobile phone i purchased to replace my old mobile whose battery failed after 10 years of use.
less than £30 whats not to like
Great talk and text phone, no issues
Good value for money

Quick collection 
Great service !
Good phone for those that ain't so good with tech. Big screen and easy to press buttons.
Bought for my Mum, she was very happy with it and the ease of using it.
I suppose for the price it was good value but it wasn’t for me.
Nice little phone - calls, texts and mp3 - sorted!
My dad uses this kind of phone as he is not comfortable with touch screen. He likes this phone.
Great basic phone with excellent battery life.
Good phone choice, happy with purchase
Really good value for money. Good solid phone and does everything I want it too and more.

Easy & Quick
and cheap

Yet another basic Nokia, my husbands' fourth. Excellent battery life, Does what is required---Sends messages and makes calls. Small and easy to handle and slips easily into my husbands' pocket  in case of emergency
Easy to use got for me dad
This Nokia phone is good i like it mostly because its size, light weight and easy to use it. Thank you
Literally no user info supplied with product, and online user guide was also not very informative
Bought as a replacement for v old Nokia. Just wanted a phone for my mum to use. Nice feature of front facing speakers.

Good, basic mobile. Works well, looks smart and the battery life is excellent. Having the volume buttons on the side is a little annoying as you can't help but press them when handling the phone, but otherwise a good design.
Great phone. Very simple to use for my elderly father.
This phone is all i require of a telephone. It is neat and i can make and answer calls no hassle.
I wanted a simple and reliable mobile.This phone is the best for someone who loves simple handset.

Great value mobile phone for everyday calls and text messages. Battery life, brilliant - charged it as soon as I bought it - lasted 10 days easily, before I recharged when it registered half-full to full. Though to be fair, I barely used it except as a timepiece.
The slight annoyance is I accidentally press the volume up and down external side pieces when in my pocket - and have learnt to hold it from the base of the phone.
Great value for money with a very long battery life.
really clear phone and very user friendly
A cheap phone which does the essentials and wont break the bank
Good little phone to throw around when you want to keep your main phone clean, dual sim comes in very handy.

From the moment I got it out of the box I hated it but Argos don’t refund on tech products. Its more bulky than I’m used to. I keep pressing the side buttons during a call which is annoying. I’m used to inbox and sent boxes but this one seems to group all messages to one person - even if they were on a different subject. The colours grey and orange aren’t exactly my faves but that’s what you get for text messages. Without any sd card you have only really awful ringtones to choose from.
Very easy to set up and use . Ideal for people who want a basic phone for messaging and phone calls. Good value for money.
Mobile works fine but the side on/off and sound switches to light and tend to cut off incoming ringing
On the whole ok looking for a simple phone for simple needs its ok. For the price its great.
Great for a short term replacement phone as my two year old broke my phone
Not what I expected. The only social media you can access is Facebook. Rubbish phone I wish I didn't buy it. Its just stuck in my draw now.
I bought this to replace an old one its a bit bigger than expected  Very long battery life good enough for what I want in a phone. Nice price
Simple & easy to use  little phone, no frills, just has a camera & music player.
Just another classic wonderful Nokia that does the job, with the added bonus of excellent loudspeakers for a feature phone. The screen is large and fits well in the hand.

I bought this for my 82yr old husband, he loves the look & finds it easy to use (still learning) he likes how he can higher the volume (a problem with most other fones) since he is hard of hearing. It is dual sim but works well with only 1, also bought him a memory card so he can take photos to his heart content without having to delete because of storage space

Great product , I bought it for my elderly mum as she like button phones and it's easy to use good value she can hear well on it and likes it she can also hear it clearly when it's in her pocket or handbag so yes I would highly recommend if people don't like modern touch screen phones
The phone is dual sim, camera that takes clear photos, can use the internet and listen to music also.
The phone is good as an android phone and has a few added extras
My Dad had a more complex phone but he struggled to work it, so I got him this one. He loves it as it does all that he needs. Great value for money
Love this product Nokia 5310 got two one for myself and one for my mum. It's clear and loud.
Handy wee phone looks good and is easy to use.  Very good price
Fab basic phone easy to use for my elderly dad just for emergencies. He loves it and finds it very easy to use and see.
I would highly recommended this product if you're looking for a simple phone for talk and text.
Does the job great reception easy to use
Great phone for people not tech minded. The only thing is that side buttons alter volume and turn it right down so you can't hear the ring tone.
Nice and easy to use nice features
Phone very good amazing
The phone worth  the price

I have loved Nokia ever since getting my 1st one several thousand feet above Hong Kong on the way to Australia .... Have had 3 more, basic ones since then, and cannot fault the useful basic technology for every day useage. Definately recomend ' This Little Beaut ' ...
Great basic phone for my 80 year old father. Only downside is that when holding phone, it’s easy to inadvertently turn the volume off.

This is a great value phone for those not wanting internet access. Large screen and font and the buttons are large enough too. Straight forward to setup.

Recommended
A great buy well worth the price super clear and fancy look!
This product is user friendly for my elderly mum and battery stays longer

Bought this cheap and cheerful phone and loved it. So easy to set up and to use. Also, it can be turned up LOUD. If you have some degree of hearing loss or work in a very noisy environment it is great. Radio is good too. It has some of the features found on a smart-phone but is no smart phone! Battery life good and very cheap to use on 02; 3p minute calls and 2p a text. When you press menu it automatically brings up messaging with contacts above. If you don't like complicated technology - great.

Wonderful product with long battery time
Smart looking
Good handset for everyone
excellent phone, long time battery,
This item is brilliant and easy to use.
THIS NOKIA 5310 I RECENTLY BROUGHT FROM ARGOS IS A NICE STYLISH MOBILE PHONE... THE BATTERY ON THOS PHONE IS EXCELLENT LASTS ME FOR A COUPLE OF DAYS... I WOULD HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS PHONE.
This phone is very good value for money it's got more features on it than you think
We bought this as a simple first phone for my nephew, so he could be contacted in the park and elsewhere. This does the job very well.
Perfect if you only need to text and make calls. On the small size
Worth this money. Oldschool Nokia

Bought this as a back-up phone. Fantastic bit of kit. Pay as you go on O2. What I like about it is that it is so simple to set up and use. It does have many things that I will never use but if you like games, internet, weather, camera, Facebook, radio, etc, it's all there. Smart phone it isn't. It's basic and designed to be. A very neat phone which will suit older people or people like me with some hearing loss. It is loud. You will hear it. Great little dual speaker radio, again, LOUD. Love it!
Bought this phone for my father in law . He loves it , very easy to use
Good phone it's worth of money
Always good value I always check argos first ever had a problem with any goods my house is argos furnished
Good solid phone with long lasting battery, internet  and dual sim what else you want for this price

It was brilliant service, next day pick up delivery
Would definitely recommend it to anyone that is looking for a phone
This basic phone does exactly what I need it for.
Very good to use excellent
Excellent little phone, perfect for person bought for.
Good phone happy with it
very easy to use, compact and looks great
calls and txt phone.all i needed it for.can transfer phone book to new phone via bluetooth.
Bought this for my mum to replace her old Nokia phone. Basic little SIM free phone which has all the features she needs. She is pleased with it

Quite good for non techies - looks similar to simple traditional Nokia phones, but with lots more capability.

BUT would benefit hugely from a comprehensive "written on paper" instruction manual - the intended user of this particular example is not familiar with any type of computer or electronic means of retrieving advice.

Alternatively, a button labelled "Make me look and work like an old, pre-2G mobile", which hid most "non phone call" features would be greatly appreciated!

I was looking for a simple little phone for a relative, this phone requires 2 SIM cards  and has large red plastic buttons on both sides of the body which are easily pressed by accident especially by someone with restricted movement in their hands. Dissapointing.

Bought this to get rid of the smartphone, the amount of life wasted on one is incredible :) - this phone was not a great experience. 20 years ago it might of been fine but texting is awful, the volume has a mind of its own when using the phone as its too easy to press the volume. It's just archaic!  the dual sim is fantastic but thats about it.  back to a smartphone I go, but with no facebook.
awful phone only bought because mine is in repair. cant download any apps. handy for snake
A satisfactory replacement for my old phone

FANTASTIC PHONE, GREAT VALUE FOR MONEY AND A NICE SLIM AND LIGHT
PHONE TO HANDLE
Great phone. Got it for my nan easy to work
Is a very good phone and you can carry easier on you
Couldn't get a signal at all so returned it the next day for a refund.
Good fort he use intended stands up well
I thought it was too good to be true. I assumed I put my sim in and go. I thought I'd be able to use it straightaway, but it wasn't as straightforward as Nokia made it out to be.

Bought this for my 65 year old mom.
She’s chuffed with this mobile phone as the battery lasts longer and she’s getting perfect reception all round the house and outside even better. Money well spent! I totally recommend this phone.
My husband’s new phone. He just wants to call and text without too much charging. Does the job at a reasonable price. Build quality looks robust.

Having decided to overcome the distraction of a smartphone this phone was exactly what I was looking for: a device that simply allows me to call and text. The keypad has a good feel to it making it swift to type SMS messages. The screen size is just right and I love the bumper controls at the side. The contemporary design betrays the low price. And I can't say I miss having to charge a phone up every night. One charge lasts me over a week. One very happy customer!

I bought this for my partner and this is his first mobile so needed it to be easy to use. This fits the bill perfectly and he has taken to it like a duck to water. He wanted a phone that would fit in his pocket and this was a good choice.
nice little phone easy to use and set up becarful that you don't click though as I ended up buying a game I didn't want was only looking
Excellent value for money. Allows me to keep the old Mini-Sim going.

For the price the phone is totally worth it. For someone who is behind the times and loves a good classic nokia. This is the phone for you 


Perfect battery. Easy navigation 

Even has a torch. Like comom you cant get any better for the price 

Love this phone ❤
simple and easy to use but still stylish and has all features including camera
A good value easy to use phone that i purchased for my technophobe husband.
5 star from very good price and service
I have had to change network but o.k. now

Build quality seems good. Plastic through out but seems durable. This phone runs on the more basic S30+ OS. This means it can do a host of things in a limited way. It is a 2G signal so no good for Three Mobile customers. Calls are loud and clear. 
The main reason I give it 4 stars is because it is aimed at music playing. If you put a lot of music on to a SD card you have to scroll through the albums to reach what you may require. You can not create playlist, only a favourite list.

Great mobile - easy to use. Has internet access, camera etc - all that one would expect with much more expensive mobiles. This one is fantastic value for money with all the perks.  So glad I purchased it.
Lori N
Not wanting a phone often so this is perfect does all I want.
This was a perfect replacement for my Dad's phone, the battery life is fab and its easy to use.

Great phone for the money. Does the job a treat and the Argos delivery service was 10 out of 10 - delivered to my door in a couple of hours! If you need a simple phone to make calls and send the odd SMS then this is the one to go for.

Bought for our mum as a replacement for her old Nokia phone after her previous 15 year old phone required another new battery! 
A great lightweight compact phone, perfect for the use of an “in an emergency“ phone.
Annoying that we can’t get rid of the dual SIM function when we only want to use 1 SIM. Using with an o2 SIM card.
Good price and I like the new design I would recommend this phone to any original Nokia fans lol am looking to get the red and white one
I bought it as a present for my niece

Too easy to accidentally alter volume due to exterior toggle button,which cannot be locked.Keep missing calls due to low sound volume,new Nokia phones are not as good as the originals.Prior to this one we had a 3310 which packed up after 15 months won't buy any more.

Am not one for a smart phone and had my old Nokia for many many years.  This is a much needed update and has new icons so it is easier to see what you need. Battery life is good. Also has the capacity to take photos but I haven't sourced the memory card yet.
Great phone, Nokia at its best
Rather flimsy construction.
Great little perfect phone. Very basic just what my Nan needed!
very good phone! long life batery I am very happy!

The slightly larger design of the nokia phone allows me to see the screen much clearly in comparison to my older Nokia phone. I love the elongated design as it looks so pleasing to the eyes. The phone itself is practical to use, and allows me to take a break from my daily usage of a smart phone. The simplicity of the design makes the phone practical and user friendly. You can even listen to the radio without a headphone, but the sound quality is better with a headphone on.
Magic just perfect love the mobile

I bought this phone as a second phone used only for calls and text messages, nothing else. The main reason is because the battery life. When your buying a new phone you have to charge the battery for 12 hours when charging the battery for the first time. With the Nokia phone I had to wait another week for the battery to discharge. I don't know how long the battery is going to last, I've charge it 10 days ago and I still have more than 75% and between 30 to 60 min of calls already. Very happy.

I originally bought this phone as a backup incase my smartphone breaks. Definitely takes me back to the mid 2000's. Great for nostalgia purposes. It's got a nice bright display and fits well in any pocket.

Light weight and easy to use for a novice to electric shavers. Bought for my husband in hospital to make it easier to shave after brain surgery which had impaired his coordination skills. He was able to use it fairly well. He was happy with it.
This is a smart easy to set up phone with a long battery and storage options. Good as a spare
Phone is easy to use and has very clear symbols. Camera is good quality too.
It's a simple phone you can't hear too loudly or clearly
